description:
Ain't no mountain high enough, ain't no valley low enough. If this sounds about right to you, these light trail shoes can get you out of anything you can get yourself into. A blend of leather, nylon, polyurethane and GORE-TEX keep it light and waterproof, while giving you modern shock absorption with old school toughness.

  • Uppers are water-resistant 1.8mm suede leather, and high tenacity nylon
  • GORE-TEX® Extended Comfort waterproof-breathable construction keeps water out
  • Tongue lining features stretch GORE-TEX, for waterproofness with outstanding fit and comfort
  • Structured toe box with abrasion-resistant toe rands adds durability
  • Polyurethane injected midsole cushions and supports your foot
  • Vibram® Energy II outsole with XS Trek rubber grips all trail terrain
name: Scarpa Vento Mid Gore-Tex Light Trail Shoes - Men's
